content: cindy is a 10-inch square made with stylecraft special double knit and a 4mm hook should you use an aran weight yarn a 5mm hook you will get a 12 inch square you can follow a 2 3 5 or 7 colour scheme which are listed in the separate pdf as well as the yarn amounts per round used there are also instructions for 1 colour in the pattern 1 ball of each colour is more then enough even if you are going to make the 1 colour square enjoy l♥ve ineke
